Today in Donegal, Rossnowlagh and Tullan Strand are lighting up with solid 7ft @ 13s W swell, complemented by a moderate 17 mph S wind. Expect fun conditions throughout the day, especially on the push. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 5ft @ 10s W with fresh 26 mph SSW winds, making it less appealing. The day after continues the trend with similar 5ft @ 11s W swell but with lighter winds at 11 mph S. Best: today.
